```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE}
library(ggfortify)
```

```{r plot_label, cache = TRUE}
d <- fortify(stats::acf(AirPassengers, plot = FALSE))
p <- ggplot(data = d, mapping = aes(x = Lag))
ggfortify:::plot_confint(p, data = d)



```
